ygData.subject: Re: agil or dex?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I saved the post, and have attached it in its entirety.  My apologies for the size of the post and usage of bandwidth. Rocket Mully, Veeshan
ygData.messageBody:
"Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" wrote:
> According to the post by J.M. last week regarding the mana use song, i
> believe he said only Charisma is used to calculate our mana, though i don't
> have the message anymore. as far as i know, no one really knows how much
> mana the level 43 song uses because it is not available yet. J.M. said this
> song would be in freeport and qeynos, and i have not seen it in freeport
> yet. if it's available please let me know, i wanna try it out.
>
> Shada Silverleaf, Level 47 Bard, Mithaniel Marr

I saved the post, and have attached it in its entirety. My
apologies for the size of the post and usage of bandwidth.

Rocket
Mully, Veeshan
